details:
If the method "SetTerminalColor", imitating colorama package, is called, then the code exfiltrated browser, discord and Minecraft passwords/tokens.


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.
Campaign: 2025-04-colorona
Reasons (based on the campaign):
 - action-hidden-in-lib-usage
 - typosquatting
 - exfiltration_browser_data
